markdownRemark.html:
I'm sorry for being so blunt,
But admittedly I'm a #@$%,
I care for her looks and blue eyes,
Interest in her words are lies,

If she should tick one box or more,
More than one night could be in store,
A hand I feel I could shatter,
Is held tight to show she matters,

Should she lack plans or act a fool,
I'll try making up these shortfalls,
If it turns out that we do suit,
I wonder if kids would be cute,

And if things do not go that far,
Que sera, sera or huzzah,
I like the arts and going for walks,
Seeking the right girl to court.

markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
I'm sorry for being so blunt,  
But admittedly I'm a #@$%,  
I care for her looks and blue eyes,  
Interest in her words are lies,  

If she should tick one box or more,  
More than one night could be in store,  
A hand I feel I could shatter,  
Is held tight to show she matters,  

Should she lack plans or act a fool,  
I'll try making up these shortfalls,  
If it turns out that we do suit,  
I wonder if kids would be cute,  

And if things do not go that far,  
Que sera, sera or huzzah,  
I like the arts and going for walks,  
Seeking the right girl to court.
